title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, September 22, 2020
description: On this day in 1862, President Lincoln signed his preliminary Emancipation Proclamation, stating any slave in the Confederacy would be free January 1st.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1862, President Lincoln signed his preliminary Emancipation Proclamation, stating any slave in the Confederacy would be free January 1st.
